title: "Air Force bristles at congressional cost limits for robot wingmen"
excerpt: "The proposal from the House Armed Services Committee would force the Air Force to divvy up drones in its robot-wingman program, known as “collaborative combat aircraft,” into specific categories whose cost limits would range from $3 million to $25 million."
